column4: how do i install windows on a disk that alread has ubuntu on it, I want to keep ubuntu, just partition off a small portion of the disk for windows
i dont want to reinstall ubuntu if i dont have to
a windows boot menu edit program?
i want to partion my disk for a windows install, i dont think a boot editor is what i need
install Ubuntu and then edit the windows boot menu
Ubuntu is already installed and windows is not.
well use a windows boot menu edit program
if you know what to do, why come here and ask?
did i sayt i knew what to do? just because im asking a question doesnt mean im completely helpless.
